run.comment: good start with 1:32:49 Midgar followed by a pretty average CD1, lost a minute due to Cloud limit farm before J-L and Aqualung. Start of CD2 wasn't anything special either but post Gaeas Cliff was amazing, Carry Armor was insane and 7s for 2 enc FD
not sure how, first 3 hours were really bad
Found a way to get to debug room without needing Yuffie. Was able to get a new WR (by about 4 minutes) with this new route. There is much more time save possible as well.
Pretty decent run, but still easily improvable. Sub 6:55 is definitely possible.
I'm really happy with this run, there is a lot of improvement to be done but I wanted a run that perfectly shows what this category can be if it is competitive and this run definitely does that.
I timed my Let's Play. Noticed it's  a WR. KappaClaus

Neat, still some time to save here though.
 For some reason, this Twitch Highlight lost some of my broadcast (the timer and the video footage jumps at several points, for example 1:31:20 - 1:31:56).
